name: Cryptonaut (bjiCorp)
description:
Cryptonaut is an old-school arcade first-person shoot 'em up inspired by the chaos that is crypto investing.

CONTROLS:

  • WASD - Ship movement.
  • LMB - Blaster
  • RMB - Missiles
  • ESC - Pause menu in-game
    • FYI Pause menu has slider for master volume control

GAMEPLAY TIPS:

  • Money in the game is your HEALTH. You also start the game with 3 lives. 
    • Being hit by enemies and projectiles will remove a life. 
    • If you run out of health (money) you will lose a life but gain $10,000 in health.
    • Your HEALTH is also your AMMO -- you also have MISSILES that you need to collect.
  • There are 3 enemy crypto types. They fly in formation and shoot at you.
    • Killing these will award you with money.
  • There are 4 pick-ups, 3 are based on crypto. These are always on their own and loop around from side to side around the level as they come toward you.
    • The orange diamond ones boost your fire rate.
    • The blue circle ones give you an additional missile.
    • The cryptonauts give you an additional life.
    • The lions are a pool of crypto money. They increase in value as the game progresses.
    • FYI regardless, all pickups also award you crypto money -- however the more they are damaged the less they will give.
